alert.note: Alert for Osborne; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 11:01PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rooks and southern Osborne Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1100 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Wakeeney to 6 miles north of Yocemento to 7 miles north of Russell. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Plainville, Palco, Codell, Damar, Natoma and Webster State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
